posts.post_content:
I have a few extra cards out of my collection I have decided to put up for sale.

1909 E90-1 Bobby Wallace $30 (poor to fair)

T206 Chief Bender w/trees SGC 50 $190
T206 Hal Chase (blue port.) PSA 4  $95
T206 Kid Elberfeld (RARE! Washington port.) SGC 10 $279
T206 Addie Joss (pitching) SGC 10 $49
T206 Nap Lajoie (port.) SGC 30  $149
T206 Christy Mathewson (black cap) poor $$109
T206 Christy Mathewson (port.) SGC 10 $129
T206 John McGraw (glove at hip) SGC 40 $119
T206 Shag Shaughnessy (Southern league) PSA 2 $169
T206 Rube Waddell (port.) SGC 20 $69

Let me know if your interested and I'll get you a scan. Prices are firm.

Email sent on the T206 Cy Young portrait.

Thank you!

Email sent on the T206 Lajoie Port and the T206 Matty Dark cap SGC10

Thanks
Dave
I will take the E90-1 Keeler if still available.  Thanks!

Send me your email and I'll get you a scan.

Chad
My e-mail is [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url].  I also sent you a PM but haven't seen a response to that message yet.  Thanks!
